title: Crash on XREAD (streams branch)
body:
Compiled on vanilla ubuntu 16.04, using commit 2970181ff236f5.

```
=== REDIS BUG REPORT START: Cut & paste starting from here ===
29240:M 08 Nov 17:45:41.889 # Redis 999.999.999 crashed by signal: 11
29240:M 08 Nov 17:45:41.889 # Crashed running the instuction at: 0x4a1d06
29240:M 08 Nov 17:45:41.889 # Accessing address: 0x7fc41e3ac79a
29240:M 08 Nov 17:45:41.889 # Failed assertion: <no assertion failed> (<no file>:0)
```
